name: Loop54JSPlugin
description: JS lib for Loop54 easy frontend implementation. Requires jQuery 2.x.x.

scripts.dev: npm run watch:lib && npm run watch:demo && npm run server
scripts.compile:lib: npm run test:lib && npm run babelify:lib
scripts.babelify:lib: browserify src/lib/index.js -o bin/Scripts/loop54-lib-1.0.0.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-2 ] ]
scripts.babelify:demo: browserify src/demo/index.js -o bin/Scripts/loop54-demo-1.0.0.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-2 ] ]

author: Loop54 Team
